attr.title: LoosePO
attr.desc: This is an ultra-lightweight Top-Down shooting game with roguelike elements. You need to constantly recycle your empty wine bottles to replenish ammunition. Use the initial props cards and the upgrade cards in the game to build a powerful butt baby, and then help it defeat the evil rotten demons.
attr.inst:
Buy the game form Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1581660/LOOSEPO/
Once installed, right click it in your library and select Manage-Browse Local Files, then COPY these files to the 'assets' folder.
